Entries.6_2: Why is it every time I have to work with a Java team, they've done something weird with their architecture?$a
Entries.8_2: Hey @, have you ever played {{i18n:video.game.{{Random:01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 08, 09}} }}? It's so good, isn't it?
Entries.SebastianRoom_9_4: %Sebastian seems to be on a call.#$b#Jane, I needed this reviewed last week! Could you please help me convince everyone to help keep things moving?
Entries.summerSebastianRoom_9_4: Sorry, @, I'm working and need to focus right now.
Entries.fallSebastianRoom_9_4: Work? Nah, @, I can implement A-star in my sleep.
Entries.winterSebastianRoom_9_4: Sorry, @, I need to work on my performance report. Why do they make me do this every year?$s

Entries.winter_15_2: @, I got a five percent raise this year! Biggest one they've ever given me!$h
Entries.3_2: Did you hear of the story of the printer that wouldn't print on Tuesdays?#$b#Man, there's always interesting bugs in the world.
Entries.SebastianRoom_9_4: %Sebastian seems to be on a call.#$b#I saw your email; is there anything in particular we could change?
Entries.summerSebastianRoom_9_4: #$c .5#I have so much work I need to do, @. Sorry, but I don't have time to chat today.#What, @, I have a performance review coming up, I need to focus$a.#
Entries.fallSebastianRoom_9_4: Ugh, I have so many emails I need to reply to.$s
Entries.winterSebastianRoom_9_4: %Sebastian looks a little bleary-eyed.#$b#Sorry, @, I was up all night debugging.$s

Entries.8_2: Did you see the story about the guy who couldn't send an email with a distance greater than 500 mi? That one was amusing.$h
Entries.10_2: All my coworkers are like, have you heard of this new programming language? It has so much more static analysis, apparently.#$b#Frankly, I'm tired of hearing about it.
Entries.SebastianRoom_9_4: %Sebastian seems to be on a call.#$b#I'm not sure I understand the third requirement.#$b#Exactly what hardware are we expected to support here?
Entries.summerSebastianRoom_9_4: @, sorry, I don't have time to speak today. I've got a very hairy bug to track down.
Entries.fallSebastianRoom_9_4: Ugh, we're updating dependencies today, so nothing works and I haven't the clue why.
